English: The phone doesn't respond to anything
The battery lasts about an hour

The glass of the phone is broken
There are color defects in the image

Finnish: Kamera ei enää toimi kuten sen pitäisi

The phone gives the busy signal all the time

Hungarian: Meg lehet még javítani a telefont?

Delete pictures to free up more space
